name: KURLI-Q LOVE
description:
KURLI-Q LOVE Styling Cream enhances sheen, softness and manageability to your hair. Perfect for wavy, coily, coarse, or thick-textured hair. Best used after freshly washed and conditioned hair.

Ingredients:
Shea (Butyrospermum Parkii) Butter, Sweet Almond (Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis) Oil, Monoi de Tahiti Oil (Cocos Nucifera [Coconut] Oil [and] Gardenia Tahitensis [Tiara] Flower Extract Oil, Babassu(Orbignya Oleifera) Oil, Sunflower (Helianthus Annuus) Oil [and] Nettle (Urtica dioica) Leaf Extract, [and] Horsetail (Equisetum arvense) Extract [and] Marshmallow (Althaea offcinalis) Extract, Apricot (Prunus Armeniaca) Kernal Oil [and] Hibiscus (Sabariffa) Flower Extract [and] Lavender (Lavandula) Flower Extract, [and] Wheat (Triticum Vulgare) Germ Oil.
